remarks: Lemma for Godowski's equation.  (Contributed by NM, 13-Nov-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
golem1.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
golem1.2 $e |- B e. CH $.
golem1.3 $e |- C e. CH $.
golem1.4 $e |- F = ( ( _|_ ` A ) vH ( A i^i B ) ) $.
golem1.5 $e |- G = ( ( _|_ ` B ) vH ( B i^i C ) ) $.
golem1.6 $e |- H = ( ( _|_ ` C ) vH ( C i^i A ) ) $.
golem1.7 $e |- D = ( ( _|_ ` B ) vH ( B i^i A ) ) $.
golem1.8 $e |- R = ( ( _|_ ` C ) vH ( C i^i B ) ) $.
golem1.9 $e |- S = ( ( _|_ ` A ) vH ( A i^i C ) ) $.
golem2 $p |- ( f e. States -> ( ( f ` ( ( F i^i G ) i^i H ) ) = 1 -> ( f ` D ) = 1 ) ) $.
